title: Deputies: 11-year-old shot in leg
content:
Please install the latest Adobe Flash Player Plugin to watch this content.
TROTWOOD, Ohio (WDTN) – AN 11-year-old Trotwood boy called his mother Monday and told her he was shot by three or four males.
Further investigation by Trotwood police found the boy was not telling the truth.
The incident happened in the back yard of a home in the 1100 block of Graystone Drive in the Townview neighborhood.
Police told 2 NEWS the child was playing with a gun when it went off and the bullet hit him in the leg.
Police said the injury is not life threatening.
